body: Brutal and disturbing a grim dark fan-fiction delux. Filled to the brim with horrors, rape and atrocities, it reflects perfectly the cruel reality of sakura taisen if it was ground in real world history. Seriously no world leader would have tried to use the Koubu only as a magical tool to beat some spooky secret organisations of simpletons. Instead they would have tried as soon as possible to conquer more colonies with it.  The hentai parts are also very elaborated and are peak notch putrid japanese misery porn. But the highlight of this was without a doubt the Lobelia story....what a tragic hero.
Da hell did i just read?
